sections.heading: Overview
content: Glade B. Curtis, MD, is board-certified by the American College of Obstetricians and Gynecologists. He is in private practice in obstetrics, gynecology, and infertility in Salt Lake City, Utah. Curtis also part of a national best-selling writing team responsible for the popular Your Pregnancy series that includes the best seller Your Pregnancy: Week by Week .
Your Pregnancy Week by Week By Glade Curtis, MD, and Judith Schuler, MS Da Capo Press, 2004
Your Baby's First Year Week by Week By Glade Curtis, MD, and Judith Schuler, MS Da Capo Lifelong Books, 2005
Your Pregnancy for the Father-to-Be: Everything Dads Need to Know About Pregnancy, Childbirth, and Getting Ready for a New Baby By Glade Curtis, MD, and Judith Schuler, MS Perseus Publishing, 2003
Bouncing Back After Your Pregnancy: What You Need to Know About Recovering From Labor and Delivery and Caring For Your New Family By Glade Curtis, MD, and Judith Schuler, MS Perseus Books Group, 2002
Your Pregnancy Quick Guide: Labor and Delivery By Glade Curtis, MD, and Judith Schuler, MS Da Capo Press, 2004
Your Pregnancy after 35 By Glade Curtis, MD, and Judith Schuler, MS Perseus Publishing, 2001
